name: Reflection (itch) (Kanguro)
description:
A lonely spirit whose trap inside a mirror in a mansion waiting eternally for her life to pass on. Luke manages to find the mirror and the spirit with it, she requested Luke to find her life's last purpose somewhere in the deep inside the mansion.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

WASD - To move around the area, and to push small crates.

Click on the "Mirror" to switch between "Luke" and "Spirit".

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
